description:
There is an uesless variable in nova.api.openstack.compute.server.py.and a typo in nova.compute.api.py

nova.api.openstack.compute.server.py lines 650  except Exception as error --> except Exception
nova.compute.api.py. lines 1097  considertaion  -->  consideration
title: an useless variable and a typo in nova-api

comments.content:
There are some uesless variables and parametesr in nova.api.openstack.compute.server.py and nova.compute.api.py.


nova.api.openstack.compute.server.py lines 650  except Exception as error --> except Exception
nova.compute.api.py. lines 563  remove the context parameter.
                               lines 1097  considertaion  -->  consideration
